CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 23, 1952, pg. 25 reads: "He's Got Class - Thirteen-year-old Randolph K. Rivers, recent winner of the Junior Double Elimination Singles Tournament conducted at Hillvue Bowling Alleys, gives a demonstration of the form that won him the title.  In winning Rivers outrolled a field of sixteen.  He had a 201 in his final game. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Randolph K. Rivers, winner of the Junior Double Elimination Singles Tournament, bowling in Hillvue Bowling Alley
